name: Legitimate Email
eml:
From: verified@example.com
Return-Path: verified@example.com
To: user@domain.com
Subject: Hello
Received-SPF: pass
Authentication-Results: spf=pass; dkim=pass; dmarc=pass
This is a normal message.

name: Spoofed Email
eml:
From: fake@badsite.com
Return-Path: spoof@badsite.com
To: user@domain.com
Subject: Urgent! Verify your account
Received-SPF: fail
Authentication-Results: spf=fail; dkim=fail; dmarc=fail
Please click this link to verify your account.

name: Ambiguous Email
eml:
From: newsletter@example.net
Return-Path: newsletter@example.net
To: user@domain.com
Subject: Weekly update
Received-SPF: neutral
No DKIM-Signature
No DMARC record
Contains links and promotional text.
